name: Missile Command (itch) (Deliriny2020)
description:
Do you remember in the movies when they are trying to avoid being hit by missiles when flying in a jet of some sort?

That's what inspired me to make this game!

Using your cursor as a "jet", avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other!

Have fun and comment below!!!

Have a great day!!

:D

P.S. There are 20 levels and more coming soon!

Also pls Follow me!
